metadata.title: CVE-2020-26409 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A DOS vulnerability exists in Gitlab CE/EE >=10.3, <13.4.7,>=13.5,<13.5.5,>=13.6, <13.6.2 that allows an attacker to trigger uncontrolledresource by bypassing input validation in markdown fields.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
